--- pipe_from_select.sql
FROM Singers
|> SELECT *
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Query{
    Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
    With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
    Query: &ast.FromQuery{
      From: &ast.From{
        From:   0,
        Source: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 5,
            NameEnd: 12,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    PipeOperators: []ast.PipeOperator{
      &ast.PipeSelect{
        Pipe:     13,
        Distinct: false,
        As:       nil,
        Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
          &ast.Star{
            Star: 23,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
FROM Singers |> SELECT *
